price: Eğer (imandan) yüz çevirirlerse, bilin ki Allah sizin sahibinizdir. O ne güzel sahip ve ne güzel yardımcıdır!
arabic: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha mawlākum niʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru
